name: DodgeStar
description:
A game about dodging celestial bodies.

The rules are simple: Do not hit the rocks. Instead, press [space] to grab them using the claw. Grabbing rocks gives you points and energy. Use the energy (red bar) to shoot impulse bullets with [Z]. Recover HP (cyan bar) collecting the cyan shiny things with your claw.

Controls
  • Left & Right arrows: Rotate ship
  • Up arrow: Move foward
  • Space: Use claw
  • Z: Shoot

Have fun!
